decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - This development shall be begun within 3 years from the date of this permission.
To comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The external materials to be used in the approved development shall match those of the existing building.
In the interest of the appearance of the development, in accordance with Council policy DMS1.
Condition : 3 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved drawings (7011/2) and specifications, unless approved otherwise in writing by the local planning authority.  
To ensure a satisfactory standard of development, and to allow the local planning authority to review any potential changes to the scheme.
Condition : 4 - In dealing with this application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive manner and the Council has, as far as practicable, sought solutions to problems arising in relation to dealing with the planning application.  We have made available detailed advice in the form of our statutory policies in the Local Plan consisting of the Core Strategy, Development Management Policies Document, Supplementary Planning Documents and where appropriate the Site Specific Allocations Document as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. In addition, where appropriate, further guidance was offered to the applicant during the processing of the application.
description: Variation of condition 'g' pursuant to planning permission dated 11/10/1979 ref 78/W/3148 (Redevelopment of site by erection of twenty three x 3 storey six room terrace houses.) so as to allow the use of the garage for habitable room with the installation of a roof light.
